title: The One About Being Black & Gay
description:
This week Monet and Bob talk to Vanessa Vanjie Matteo, discuss being black and gay, and Monet tells Bob to be nice! Do you love sibling rivalry? Support our podcast by going to our patreon page, there you’ll find exclusive content and have the ability to support our show. https://www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast --- This episode is sponsored by · Music + Talk: Got an idea for a Music + Talk show? Get started by downloading the free Anchor app or going to anchor.fm/musicplustalk anchor.fm/musicplustalk Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/siblingrvalry/support
